Constructor Detail

RegistryBrowser

public RegistryBrowser(Registry contents,
                       java.lang.String type)
To set up a registry browser. You need to provide the registry it will be browsing, and the type of stuff in there. The type is used to read the panels from the properties file. Properties are of the type: browser..panel.count - Count of panels. browser..panel..name - Name for the panel. browser..panel..class - Class of the panel. Implement RegistryBrowserAware if you would like the panel to know about the browser it is on.
